metadata.title: USN-6746-1 -- Google Guest Agent and Google OS Config Agent vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Google Guest Agent and Google OS Config Agent incorrectly handled certain JSON files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6746-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  google-osconfig-agent - 20230504.00-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 No subscription required  google-guest-agent - 20231004.02-0ubuntu1~22.04.4 No subscription required
